resources.string: Cannot upload spot. Check yo network.
Cannot use camera flash as PTT. Please disable this in settings.
Cannot use camera flash as PTT because of old (below M version) android. Please disable this in settings or buy a new phone.
Allows use of a camera flashlight as PTT control. Android M and higher only.
TX disabled starting from next cycle.
TX enabled starting from next cycle.
Updates your location as you move. Requires GPS hardware in your phone/tablet/etc.
to determine location if GPS is not available. Requires internet.
Provides finer position, requires 2 transmission cycles.
Cannot obitain fine location. Check permissions or disable GPS in app settings.
Cannot obitain coarse location. Check permissions or disable CellTowers in app settings.
ERROR: export file already exists. Delete it manually if it does not contains important data and try again.

This action will remove all the decoded contacts from the database, but will keep all settings. This cannot be undone if you haven\'t backed it up. (WARNING: db import is impossible at this moment, you can only export it).\n This will not delete messages from WSPRnet you\'ve already uploaded to them.
Your database gone. (As well as your radio)
Requires a government-issued licence and band allocation. Check laws of your country.
Chance in %s of next two-minute cycle is being the transmition instead of reception.
TX probability (in percent) should be an integer between 0 and 100. (e.g. 25).\n Do not include a percent sign or a comma.\n Value was reset to 25.
Not all the bands included in the app may be availablein your country. Please check laws before transmitting.

You should enter a 6 character QTH locator in following format: XX00xx.
 If you want to transmit only a 4 character locator, just uncheck this feature in the settings below.
 If you don't know remaining two letters just append "ll" AND uncheck the full grid option.
 However if you using an extended callsign, you cannot use a 4 character locator. 
 (just use "ll" for privacy or enable GPS/celltower location).

Invalid callsign provided.
 The WSPR does not allow all the types of callsigns.
 You may either use:
 XXX/XX0XXX (RA0/IT0AAA, RU/DE3A)
 XX0XXX (R0TST, RA0TST, R0T)
 XX0XXX/X (R0TST/P, RA0TST/M, RA0TST/3)
 XX0XXX/00 (R0TST/12)
 Where:
 X - a letter from A to Z, a number or absence of symbol
 0 - a digit (0-9).
 All the questions - to K1JT.
Wanna WSPR? You\'ve got it!\nWelcome to the first decoding-capable WSPR client for android!

In this window you can see all the messages that was received since last database removal or app instalation.
 Some of them start with a hash sign followed by a number (e.g. #1234) - this are TYPE-3 messages (see WSPR documentation).
 They do not include a callsign, only it's hash and may not be added to the log if previous message with a valid callsign was not received.
 Log tab on the other hand contains all messages which callsigns are known, and their QTH field can be updated by TYPE-3 messages, which themselves are not displayed in the log tab.
Cannot use 4 letter locator with pre/postfix callsign.
Cannot disable the flash. Please, report to base.
Error uploading spots. Check internet connection, try again or report a bug.
Your callsign is not set. Set at least a random SWL callsign and try again.
FRQ. does not belongs to any known band.

Spot upload is in progress. \n Do you want to abort?\n (you may choose to do so if progress is not moving in a long time. If it is still not moving after a few tries, check your internet connection or upload spots later at home/hotel/base/bunker/etc if you are working portable in the middle of nowhere.)

"The Loud Bang project, Fully operational WSPR client for Android. v 0.41
" "Wanna WSPR? You've got it!
" "© 2020 Nuclear Awareness Team. 

"
"This software is distributed without any warranty under GNU GPL v.3 license, " "text of which can be obitained here: 
" "https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt

"
"This software uses source code of: 
" "- wsprd by K1JT (C parts only),
" "- libfftw3 by (Matteo Frigo,Steven G. Johnson, others)
" "- WSPRenc by BD1ES
" "- and possibly other projects.
" "- Icons from https://www.flaticon.com/authors/freepik
" "Separate thanks to Guenael for his repository that suggested " "that I can just trow away pieces of Fortran from original wsprd " "https://github.com/Guenael/rtlsdr-wsprd" "

"
"A word on that: This software may be less sensitive because of that
" "so, if you know both Fortran and C, please help [by] porting the code to C.

"
"If you want to translate this app to your language, you need to" "find a file called strings.xml in the project source code, " "open it in any text editor that supports UTF-8 and modify it " "while following XML markup language. If your language is weirder than " "mine, you need to provide additional details on what I should do with " "numerals etc. But it may take a long time to implement all this, so " "it's better if you prepare a separate file that will work somehow without " "modifying large portions of code.

" "There is NO Iphone(r)©(tm) version planned. I do not have any Apple inc. " "devices to code/test/debug on, I am unfamiliar with their systems." "

"
"We, HAMs need more skilled coders. So, if you want to say thanks with a coin, go and " "pay someone who will create and release a new cool opensource app like this one. " "(I mean REALLY cool, not another logbook).
" "If you still want to donate, you have to do this in Bitcoin, " "since I prefer to remain anonymity:
" "- 3LHpmYMo2Zo3RaZqTvHsT3isFJ5rvj4xWU or:
" "- bc1qy633s5me0ytyalgl3ra8k2pgc4eaqcgcl3srwc 
" "

"

The Loud Bang application has crashed. Now you can send some information about what just happened to us via E-mail, so we can investigate and fix the issue. This is totally voluntary, you may press cancel and do what you like. Or press OK to review and send the crash report.

"Cannot initialize AudioRecord-ing of your device.\n" "This might be due to the app being incompatible with your device.\n" "Please contact me with some information about your device model and manufacturer."
